question."},{"lineNumber":86392,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それが部下にしてくれって奴の態度かよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Is that the attitude of someone asking to be my subordinate?\""},{"lineNumber":86393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、だが面白い」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, but interesting.\""},{"lineNumber":86394,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、俺は最強だからな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, because I am the strongest!\""},{"lineNumber":86395,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前なんぞに絶ーっ対に噛み殺されたりせんわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I would absolutely never be bitten to death by the likes of you!\""},{"lineNumber":86396,"originalJapaneseLine":"「好きにしろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do as you please.\""},{"lineNumber":86397,"originalJapaneseLine":"『石丸』の言葉に、黒部が笑う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurobe laughed at Ishimaru's words."},{"lineNumber":86398,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha ha ha ha ha ha!\""},{"lineNumber":86399,"originalJapaneseLine":"愉快さから笑ったことなど、","translatedEnglishLine":"He had never laughed out of such delight before,"},{"lineNumber":86400,"originalJapaneseLine":"生まれて初めてのことだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was the very first time in his life."},{"lineNumber":86401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「面白い、なら――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Interesting, then—\""},{"lineNumber":86402,"originalJapaneseLine":"『ランス』の言葉に、黒部が笑う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurobe laughed at Rance's words."},{"lineNumber":86403,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha ha ha ha ha ha!\""},{"lineNumber":86404,"originalJapaneseLine":"これほど愉快なのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"He hadn't been this amused since"},{"lineNumber":86405,"originalJapaneseLine":"石丸の部下になった日以来だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the day he became Ishimaru’s subordinate."},{"lineNumber":86406,"originalJapaneseLine":"「面白い、なら――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Interesting, then—\""},{"lineNumber":86407,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日から俺はお前の部下だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From today, I am your subordinate!\""},{"lineNumber":86408,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、宜しくな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, nice to meet you.\""},{"lineNumber":86409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっかし、改めて見ても犬だな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Still, seeing it again, he’s a dog after all...\""},{"lineNumber":86410,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リセットが見たら喜びそうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset would probably be happy to see this.\""},{"lineNumber":86411,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リセ……なんだって？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rise... what did you say?\""},{"lineNumber":86412,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは面白い部下が出来たと","translatedEnglishLine":"Ishimaru laughed, thinking he had gotten an interesting subordinate."},{"lineNumber":86413,"originalJapaneseLine":"『石丸』は笑っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ishimaru was smiling."},{"lineNumber":86414,"originalJapaneseLine":"本当に、本当に嬉しそうで、","translatedEnglishLine":"He looked truly, genuinely happy,"},{"lineNumber":86415,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで子供のように喜ばれるのが嬉しくて――","translatedEnglishLine":"delighting so much as if he were a child—and that made him happy—"},{"lineNumber":86416,"originalJapaneseLine":"隙を見せたら殺す、","translatedEnglishLine":"He forgot even about the shy remark, 'I'll kill you if you show a weakness,'"},

{"lineNumber":86417,"originalJapaneseLine":"などという照れ隠しも忘れて、","translatedEnglishLine":"he forgot such embarrassment and,"},

{"lineNumber":86418,"originalJapaneseLine":"黒部も一緒になって笑った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurobe laughed along with him."},

{"lineNumber":86419,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはもう数千年も昔の話である――","translatedEnglishLine":"That was a story from thousands of years ago—"},

{"lineNumber":86420,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},

{"lineNumber":86421,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},

{"lineNumber":86422,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あわわわ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Awawawa...\""},{"lineNumber":86423,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様が妖怪王様を部下にしちゃいました」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance has made the Youkai King his subordinate.\""},{"lineNumber":86424,"originalJapaneseLine":"「話し合いが成立すればいいと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I only thought it would be good if a dialogue could be reached,"},{"lineNumber":86425,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思っていた程度だったんだがな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"that was about all I hoped for...\""},{"lineNumber":86426,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まさか本当に部下にするとは思わなかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I never expected he'd actually make him his subordinate.\""},{"lineNumber":86427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ……本当に大した男だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh... he really is an extraordinary man.\""},{"lineNumber":86428,"originalJapaneseLine":"伝説の妖怪王、黒部がランスの部下となった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The legendary Youkai King, Kurobe, became Rance’s subordinate."},

{"lineNumber":86429,"originalJapaneseLine":"国境、天満橋、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the border, Tenman Bridge,"},

{"lineNumber":86430,"originalJapaneseLine":"JAPAN防衛本部――","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN Defense Headquarters—"},

{"lineNumber":86431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},

{"lineNumber":86432,"originalJapaneseLine":"先に天満橋に戻り防衛隊に参加し","translatedEnglishLine":"Isoroku, having returned earlier to Tenman Bridge to join the defense forces,"},

{"lineNumber":86433,"originalJapaneseLine":"指揮を取っていた五十六は顔を歪めていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was grimacing as he took command."},

{"lineNumber":86434,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あまりに魔軍の攻めが苛烈すぎる……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(The demon army’s assault is far too brutal...)"},

{"lineNumber":86435,"originalJapaneseLine":"（これではそう遠くない内に……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(At this rate, it won’t be long before...)"},

{"lineNumber":86436,"originalJapaneseLine":"守りの限界、","translatedEnglishLine":"the limit of our defense,"},

{"lineNumber":86437,"originalJapaneseLine":"無限に湧くとも思える魔軍の兵士達相手に","translatedEnglishLine":"against enemy demon soldiers who seem to spawn endlessly,"},

{"lineNumber":86438,"originalJapaneseLine":"天満橋防衛隊は既に虫の息だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the Tenman Bridge defense force was already on its last legs."},

{"lineNumber":86439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...?\""},{"lineNumber":86440,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時、背後からの歓声めいた声が上がり、","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, a cheer-like voice rose from behind,"},

{"lineNumber":86441,"originalJapaneseLine":"五十六は振り返る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Isoroku turned around."},

{"lineNumber":86442,"originalJapaneseLine":"「遅くなった！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry I'm late!\""},

{"lineNumber":86443,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...!\""},

{"lineNumber":86444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「妖怪王独眼流政宗率いる妖怪軍団！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Youkai Army led by Youkai King Dokuganryu Masamune!"},

{"lineNumber":86445,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただいまより義に従い助太刀する！」","translatedEnglishLine":"From now on, we will assist you out of loyalty!\""},

{"lineNumber":86446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「政宗殿！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Masamune!\""},

{"lineNumber":86447,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、それに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, and also...\""},

{"lineNumber":86448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「初代妖怪王黒部、見参！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The first Youkai King, Kurobe, appears!\""},

{"lineNumber":86449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「新たな主の命令により加勢すんぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We join the fight under orders of our new lord!\""},

{"lineNumber":86450,"originalJapaneseLine":"先頭を政宗と黒部が並び、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the front, Masamune and Kurobe stood side by side,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その問いに『石丸』が答える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ishimaru answered that question.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それが部下にしてくれって奴の態度かよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Is that the attitude of someone asking to be my subordinate?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、だが面白い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, but interesting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺は最強だからな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha, because I am the strongest!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前なんぞに絶ーっ対に噛み殺されたりせんわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I would absolutely never be bitten to death by the likes of you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「好きにしろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do as you please."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『石丸』の言葉に、黒部が笑う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe laughed at Ishimaru's words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha ha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愉快さから笑ったことなど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had never laughed out of such delight before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生まれて初めてのことだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the very first time in his life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白い、なら――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Interesting, then—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ランス』の言葉に、黒部が笑う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe laughed at Rance's words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha ha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これほど愉快なのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hadn't been this amused since

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石丸の部下になった日以来だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the day he became Ishimaru’s subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白い、なら――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Interesting, then—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日から俺はお前の部下だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From today, I am your subordinate!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、宜しくな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, nice to meet you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっかし、改めて見ても犬だな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, seeing it again, he’s a dog after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットが見たら喜びそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset would probably be happy to see this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセ……なんだって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rise... what did you say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは面白い部下が出来たと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ishimaru laughed, thinking he had gotten an interesting subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『石丸』は笑っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ishimaru was smiling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に、本当に嬉しそうで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He looked truly, genuinely happy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで子供のように喜ばれるのが嬉しくて――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: delighting so much as if he were a child—and that made him happy—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隙を見せたら殺す、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He forgot even about the shy remark, 'I'll kill you if you show a weakness,'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: などという照れ隠しも忘れて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he forgot such embarrassment and,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部も一緒になって笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe laughed along with him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはもう数千年も昔の話である――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was a story from thousands of years ago—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あわわわ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Awawawa..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様が妖怪王様を部下にしちゃいました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance has made the Youkai King his subordinate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「話し合いが成立すればいいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I only thought it would be good if a dialogue could be reached,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思っていた程度だったんだがな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was about all I hoped for..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか本当に部下にするとは思わなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never expected he'd actually make him his subordinate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ……本当に大した男だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh... he really is an extraordinary man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伝説の妖怪王、黒部がランスの部下となった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The legendary Youkai King, Kurobe, became Rance’s subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国境、天満橋、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the border, Tenman Bridge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPAN防衛本部――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN Defense Headquarters—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先に天満橋に戻り防衛隊に参加し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isoroku, having returned earlier to Tenman Bridge to join the defense forces,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮を取っていた五十六は顔を歪めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was grimacing as he took command.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （あまりに魔軍の攻めが苛烈すぎる……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The demon army’s assault is far too brutal...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （これではそう遠くない内に……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (At this rate, it won’t be long before...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守りの限界、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the limit of our defense,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無限に湧くとも思える魔軍の兵士達相手に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: against enemy demon soldiers who seem to spawn endlessly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋防衛隊は既に虫の息だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Tenman Bridge defense force was already on its last legs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、背後からの歓声めいた声が上がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, a cheer-like voice rose from behind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五十六は振り返る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isoroku turned around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遅くなった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry I'm late!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪王独眼流政宗率いる妖怪軍団！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Youkai Army led by Youkai King Dokuganryu Masamune!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただいまより義に従い助太刀する！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, we will assist you out of loyalty!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「政宗殿！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Masamune!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、それに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, and also..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「初代妖怪王黒部、見参！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The first Youkai King, Kurobe, appears!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「新たな主の命令により加勢すんぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We join the fight under orders of our new lord!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先頭を政宗と黒部が並び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the front, Masamune and Kurobe stood side by side,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その問いに『石丸』が答える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ishimaru answered that question.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それが部下にしてくれって奴の態度かよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Is that the attitude of someone asking to be my subordinate?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、だが面白い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, but interesting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺は最強だからな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha, because I am the strongest!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前なんぞに絶ーっ対に噛み殺されたりせんわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I would absolutely never be bitten to death by the likes of you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「好きにしろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do as you please."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『石丸』の言葉に、黒部が笑う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe laughed at Ishimaru's words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha ha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愉快さから笑ったことなど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had never laughed out of such delight before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生まれて初めてのことだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the very first time in his life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白い、なら――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Interesting, then—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ランス』の言葉に、黒部が笑う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe laughed at Rance's words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha ha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これほど愉快なのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hadn't been this amused since

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石丸の部下になった日以来だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the day he became Ishimaru’s subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白い、なら――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Interesting, then—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日から俺はお前の部下だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From today, I am your subordinate!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、宜しくな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, nice to meet you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっかし、改めて見ても犬だな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, seeing it again, he’s a dog after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットが見たら喜びそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset would probably be happy to see this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセ……なんだって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rise... what did you say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは面白い部下が出来たと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ishimaru laughed, thinking he had gotten an interesting subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『石丸』は笑っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ishimaru was smiling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に、本当に嬉しそうで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He looked truly, genuinely happy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで子供のように喜ばれるのが嬉しくて――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: delighting so much as if he were a child—and that made him happy—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隙を見せたら殺す、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He forgot even about the shy remark, 'I'll kill you if you show a weakness,'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: などという照れ隠しも忘れて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he forgot such embarrassment and,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部も一緒になって笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe laughed along with him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはもう数千年も昔の話である――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was a story from thousands of years ago—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あわわわ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Awawawa..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様が妖怪王様を部下にしちゃいました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance has made the Youkai King his subordinate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「話し合いが成立すればいいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I only thought it would be good if a dialogue could be reached,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思っていた程度だったんだがな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was about all I hoped for..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか本当に部下にするとは思わなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never expected he'd actually make him his subordinate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ……本当に大した男だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh... he really is an extraordinary man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伝説の妖怪王、黒部がランスの部下となった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The legendary Youkai King, Kurobe, became Rance’s subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国境、天満橋、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the border, Tenman Bridge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPAN防衛本部――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN Defense Headquarters—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先に天満橋に戻り防衛隊に参加し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isoroku, having returned earlier to Tenman Bridge to join the defense forces,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮を取っていた五十六は顔を歪めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was grimacing as he took command.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （あまりに魔軍の攻めが苛烈すぎる……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The demon army’s assault is far too brutal...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （これではそう遠くない内に……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (At this rate, it won’t be long before...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守りの限界、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the limit of our defense,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無限に湧くとも思える魔軍の兵士達相手に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: against enemy demon soldiers who seem to spawn endlessly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋防衛隊は既に虫の息だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Tenman Bridge defense force was already on its last legs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、背後からの歓声めいた声が上がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, a cheer-like voice rose from behind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五十六は振り返る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isoroku turned around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遅くなった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry I'm late!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪王独眼流政宗率いる妖怪軍団！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Youkai Army led by Youkai King Dokuganryu Masamune!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただいまより義に従い助太刀する！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, we will assist you out of loyalty!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「政宗殿！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Masamune!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、それに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, and also..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「初代妖怪王黒部、見参！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The first Youkai King, Kurobe, appears!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「新たな主の命令により加勢すんぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We join the fight under orders of our new lord!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先頭を政宗と黒部が並び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the front, Masamune and Kurobe stood side by side,
